name: Wheezing Kennel
description:
Made in 2 weeks for the Beginners Circle Jam #3

Wheezing Kennel is a top-down horror title inspired by early 2000s browser based flash horror.  As the player you push yourself through tight caves in an attempt to escape the situation you have been forced into, and discover what's really going on. Now commencing attempt No#1372.

Programming, Level Design, Sound Design, Story: Sunken Squid

Art, Graphics: YHY_Games https://yhy-games.itch.io/

Music: Jesza https://soundcloud.com/jeszamusic

A huge thank you to both YHY_Games and Jesza for their hard work on this project. Its been an absolute pleasure working with you guys. Thank you for believing in me.
